plot: Koro's day takes an unexpected turn when his daughter Tania returns home after 10 years. Having to deal with past hurt and resentment, Koro must also meet his grandson for the first time, non-English speaking 10 year old Miguel
title: Kia Ora Miguel
plot_es: Koro's day takes an unexpected turn when his daughter Tania returns home after 10 years. Having to deal with past hurt and resentment, Koro must also meet his grandson for the first time, non-English speaking 10 year old Miguel
plot_en: Koro's day takes an unexpected turn when his daughter Tania returns home after 10 years. Having to deal with past hurt and resentment, Koro must also meet his grandson for the first time, non-English speaking 10 year old Miguel
